itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 30, 2013
teaser: The well is running dry at BP -- the money well. A new report on Apple's supply chain is raising questions about the accuracy of Apple's critics. The housing boom and bust from a realtor's point of view. And does the cronut need a patent?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 30, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, Rob Schmitz, Sally Herships, Mark Garrison, Stan Alcorn, David Weinberg, Molly Wood, Sam Beard, Mitchell Hartman and David Brancaccio
description: The well is running dry at BP -- the money well. A new report on Apple's supply chain is raising questions about the accuracy of Apple's critics. The housing boom and bust from a realtor's point of view. And does the cronut need a patent?
